meanings.definition: The state of being disordered or chaotic.
meanings.sent1: The disorderednesses of the room made it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent2: The disorderednesses of the files made it difficult to locate the important documents.
meanings.sent3: The disorderednesses of the party seating arrangement led to some comical mix-ups.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a jumble, a disorderednesses of ideas swirling in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The disorderednesses of the traffic jam caused frustration for all the drivers.

meanings.sent1: The disorderednesses in the classroom made it challenging to focus on the lesson.
meanings.sent2: The disorderednesses of the schedule caused confusion among the team members.
meanings.sent3: The disorderednesses of the shopping list resulted in buying unnecessary items.
meanings.sent4: The disorderednesses of the books on the shelf made it look like a literary chaos.
meanings.sent5: The disorderednesses of the paperwork piled up on the desk created a sense of overwhelm.

meanings.definition: A condition of confusion or irregularity.
meanings.sent1: The disorderednesses of his thoughts made it hard for him to make a decision.
meanings.sent2: The disorderednesses of the weather forecast caused uncertainty among the travelers.
meanings.sent3: The disorderednesses of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were a disorderednesses of joy and sadness, all mixed together.
meanings.sent5: The disorderednesses of the garden layout gave it a wild and untamed appearance.
